item.title: CVE-2020-4864|2024-09-17T01:56:42.062Z -- ibm -- resilient%20onprem
item.description: IBM Resilient SOAR V38.0 could allow an attacker on the internal net work to provide the server with a spoofed source IP address. IBM X-Force ID: 190567.
